catalog_info.title: Understanding Aging: Degeneration, Regeneration, and the Scientific Search for the Fountain of Youth
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Life and Physical Sciences A or Life Sciences 1a; Life Sciences 1b; SCRB 10 or MCB 54.
catalog_info.description: This lecture and discussion course will explore the fundamental molecular and cellular mechanisms that govern organismal aging and contemporary strategies to delay or reverse this process.
